# Welcome {-}

Welcome! This book is an adapation of the Library Carpentry lesson [Introduction to Working with Data](https://librarycarpentry.org/lc-data-intro/). It was made by Vicky Steeves for a Library Carpentry workshop at NYU.

## Setup {-}

This lesson does not require any special setup!
